title: Too Great and Terrible (3R85)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Spot a Nazgul to wound Gandalf twice. The Free Peoples player may discard 2 [Gandalf] cards from hand to prevent this.
Lore:	“His eyes flashed and his face was lit as by a fire within. 'Do not tempt me! For I do not wish to become like the Dark Lord himself.'”
Rarity:	R
